actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to provide for reimbursement to the State of Wisconsin for extraordinary law enforcement costs incurred during operations associated with the exercise of court-determined tribal treaty rights.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Wisconsin Law Enforcement Reimbursement Act - Directs the Attorney General to reimburse Wisconsin for extraordinary law enforcement costs incurred by State and local law enforcement agencies during operations associated with the exercise of court-determined treaty rights by the Chippewa Indians of Lake Superior in 1988 and 1989. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for reimbursement to the State of Wisconsin for extraordinary law enforcement costs incurred during operations associated with the exercise of court-determined tribal treaty rights.
